reviews.text: I missed my train today and the lady working at the station was the most helpful person! She made my journey so much better and gave me all the info I needed with out even having to ask! Great service! Thank you!

The GTR team based at this station are very skilled at their jobs and very helpful. Unfortunately when things go wrong on the railway these guys are on the frontline and cop the criticism from passengers. The top team at GTR should be very proud of their team at LGC.
Fantastic station, staff always so friendly, proud to call it my home station, I can be in London in 22 minutes where else can you can do that from a "commuter" station
Good service to and from London and Cambridge from this station but I hope that they start running many more Thameslink services to the south of London and beyond!
